original_title: A Lifetime of Childlike Faith: The Leonard Knight Story
overview: The work of Leonard Knight has captured the interest of such greats as National Geographic, Ripley's Believe It or Not, and the Discovery Channel. A Lifetime of Childlike Faith tells the true story of the simple man behind Salvation Mountain, and how his faith has driven him to do the seemingly impossible without even the benefit of electricity or running water. Approx. 35 minutes.
title: A Lifetime of Childlike Faith: The Leonard Knight Story
